subject: Officiating (Sports)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: An internal investigation by the N.B.A. refuted a claim by the lawyers of former referee Tim Donaghy saying others were involved in betting on and manipulating the outcome of games.
snippet: An internal investigation by the N.B.A. refuted a claim by the lawyers of former referee Tim Donaghy saying others were involved in betting on and manipulating the outcome of games.
